md:
giải nghĩa từ "provide" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

**Provide** (verb)

* Meaning: to give or supply something that is needed or wanted
* Example: The hotel provides free breakfast for its guests.
* Related words: supply, offer, furnish, give

**Provide** (verb)

* Meaning: to make something available or possible
* Example: The new policy provides more opportunities for young people to get jobs.
* Related words: make available, offer, enable, facilitate

**Provide** (verb)

* Meaning: to take care of someone or something
* Example: The government provides financial support to low-income families.
* Related words: take care of, support, care for, look after

**Provide** (verb)

* Meaning: to state or show something as evidence or proof
* Example: The company provides documentation to prove the quality of their products.
* Related words: state, show, demonstrate, prove
html:
giải nghĩa từ "provide" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

Provide (verb)

  • Meaning: to give or supply something that is needed or wanted
  • Example: The hotel provides free breakfast for its guests.
  • Related words: supply, offer, furnish, give

Provide (verb)

  • Meaning: to make something available or possible
  • Example: The new policy provides more opportunities for young people to get jobs.
  • Related words: make available, offer, enable, facilitate

Provide (verb)

  • Meaning: to take care of someone or something
  • Example: The government provides financial support to low-income families.

Provide (verb)

  • Example: The company provides documentation to prove the quality of their products.
  • Related words: state, show, demonstrate, prove
